name: My Witch Shop (unfinished)
description:
A little unfinished game I made for LDjam. 
Use Arrow keys to walk and E to shoot.

Current game: Only fighting part of game - a little dungeon with some slimes. I ran into some big issues at the end of the gamejam, so it's unfinished. As is, you can't really win the game, but fool around a bit.

The original game idea: You sell weapons & potions during the day to monsters & go during the night in the dungeon to gather new loot for your store.
The twist is that some of the wizards you sell stuff to may appear later in the dungeon.
So you gotta be smart about who to trust.

Credits: Music by Viktor Kraus, Coin Sound by artisticdude
